xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 30 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 12:05 <BogdanVancea> has joined #medsavant 12:05 <BogdanVancea> hello, sdumitriu 12:05 <BogdanVancea> :) 12:08 <sdumitriu1> Hi 12:10 <BogdanVancea> how are you? 12:12 <sdumitriu1> OK, you? 12:12 <BogdanVancea> pretty good 12:12 <BogdanVancea> just got back from school, its pouring ouside 12:13 <BogdanVancea> I'm going to get back on trying to run medsavant from the maven build 12:14 <BogdanVancea> one of the latest commits seems to have added some code about a global exception handler 12:14 <BogdanVancea> I'm having trouble running the client now, even from netbeans 12:14 <sdumitriu1> In Romania it's raining cats and community dogs 12:14 <BogdanVancea> =)))) 12:14 <BogdanVancea> very true 12:15 <BogdanVancea> although there have been fewer stray dogs 12:15 <BogdanVancea> as of late 12:15 <BogdanVancea> in Cluj-Napoca, atleast 12:26 <sdumitriu1> Oh no, where did I go? 12:27 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 12:27 <BogdanVancea> ;)) 12:27 <BogdanVancea> how come you're logged in twice? 12:28 <sdumitriu1> Once from home, once from the lab 12:29 <BogdanVancea> oh, I see 12:30 <BogdanVancea> and you're always logged in from the lab? 12:33 <sdumitriu1> No, always from home 12:34 <BogdanVancea> I see 12:35 <BogdanVancea> I sometimes log in in the morning and you're always on the channel 12:36 <BogdanVancea> but I think my mornings coincide with 3-4 am toronto time 15:05 <BogdanVancea_> has joined #medsavant 16:12 <BogdanVancea> I've been playing around with MedSavant 16:13 <BogdanVancea> and I have a really annoying error 16:14 <BogdanVancea> I can't search for any variants because of a java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError on a swing component 16:15 <BogdanVancea> should I write a mail to the dev list? or can I ask you? 16:15 <sdumitriu1> Which class? 16:15 <BogdanVancea> org.ut.biolab.mfiume.query.view.ScrollableJPopupMenu 16:16 <sdumitriu1> K, checking 16:16 <BogdanVancea> thanks 16:18 <sdumitriu1> That's the class that's not found, or the one where a required class isn't found? 16:19 <BogdanVancea> that's the class that's not found 16:19 <BogdanVancea> GLOBAL EXCEPTION HANDLER: AWT-EventQueue-0: java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError GLOBAL EXCEPTION HANDLER: AWT-EventQueue-0: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class org.ut.biolab.mfiume.query.view.ScrollableJPopupMenu 16:19 <BogdanVancea> the global exception handler reports a noclassdeffounderror 16:19 <sdumitriu1> Hm, I think it's the other way around 16:19 <BogdanVancea> when I try to write something in the search bar 16:19 <sdumitriu1> It can't create the class because a dependency is missing 16:20 <BogdanVancea> hmmm 16:20 <sdumitriu1> But all of the dependencies are standard java. or javax. 16:22 <BogdanVancea> its weird 16:22 <BogdanVancea> I'll modify the global exception handler code to also print out the trace 16:25 <BogdanVancea> hmm, nvm, I think I've found whats wrong 16:25 <BogdanVancea> the widget eventually calls getResource on some .png images 16:26 <BogdanVancea> and I think they're not found on the classpath 16:26 <sdumitriu1> Ah, right 16:26 <sdumitriu1> I know how to fix that 16:38 <BogdanVancea> so it is a classpath configuration issue on my part? 16:39 <sdumitriu1> Not sure, hold on a bit 16:39 <BogdanVancea> ok 16:39 <sdumitriu1> What did you build with? 16:39 <sdumitriu1> With netbeans it should work 16:40 <BogdanVancea> I've build with Idea 16:40 <BogdanVancea> when I try to build the same project with netbeans, I get en error at the initialization of the global exception handler 16:44 <BogdanVancea> hmm, you're right 16:44 <BogdanVancea> I've managed to get the client running 16:44 <BogdanVancea> from netbeans 16:50 <BogdanVancea> Hm, I've also found how to run the netbeans ant task from Idea 16:50 <sdumitriu1> So, open medsavant client, login, go to Variants, then type in the searchbar, right? 16:51 <BogdanVancea> yes 16:52 <BogdanVancea> if you open with netbeans 16:52 <BogdanVancea> a dropdown appears 16:52 <BogdanVancea> when I ran it with Idea, I got the error 16:52 <sdumitriu1> OK, I think I fixed it, let me check and commit 16:53 <BogdanVancea> awesome :D 16:54 <sdumitriu1> OK, pull, try to run from IDEA 16:55 <sdumitriu1> I gotta go, ttyl 16:56 <BogdanVancea> k
